NavigatorLogin.summary: NOTE Experimental The NavigatorLogin interface of the Federated Credential Management (FedCM) API defines login functionality for federated identity providers (IdPs). Specifically, it enables a federated identity provider (IdP) to set its login status when a user signs into or out of the IdP.

remarks.para: See Update login status using the Login Status API for more details of how this is used.
NavigatorLogin is accessed via the property.
